headline: Refiners Smell Profits as Heavy Crude Comes Roaring Back--But One Risk Lurks
summary: Cheap Canadian, Middle Eastern, and California oil could widen margins--unless Russian sanctions flip the script.

raw.headline: Refiners Smell Profits as Heavy Crude Comes Roaring Back--But One Risk Lurks
raw.summary: Cheap Canadian, Middle Eastern, and California oil could widen margins--unless Russian sanctions flip the script.

headline: Marathon Q2 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Expenses Down Y/Y
summary: MPC expects a refining operating cost of $5.70 per barrel and a 92% utilization rate for its total throughput in the third quarter of 2025.

raw.headline: Marathon Q2 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Expenses Down Y/Y
raw.summary: MPC expects a refining operating cost of $5.70 per barrel and a 92% utilization rate for its total throughput in the third quarter of 2025.
